attributes.action: change the age limit for a cervical screen from 25 to once you've had a baby!
attributes.additional_details:
THE AGE AT THE MOMENT IS 25 IN ENGLAND AND 20 IN SCOTLAND AND WALES!

LADIES HAVE DIED EARLYER THE 20!

I BELIEVE LADIES SHOULD HAVE A SMEAR IF WANTED ONCE THEY HAVE HAD A CHILD AS THE RISKS ARE GREATER!

PLEASE SHARE THIS WE NEED AS MANY SIGNATURES AS POSSIBLE!
